content.prompt: Complete the following function according to its docstring.Note: this function should return None.  Its job is to modify the list passed as its argument.
content.source_code:
[student_code]
def swap_name(name_list): 
    """ (list of str) -> NoneType 
 
    name_list contains a single person's name.  Modify name_list so that the first name and last name are swapped. 
                 
    >>> name = ['John', 'Smith'] 
    >>> swap_name(name) 
    >>> name 
    ['Smith', 'John'] 
    >>> name = ['John', 'Andrew', 'Gleeson', 'Smith'] 
    >>> swap_name(name) 
    >>> name 
    ['Smith', 'Andrew', 'Gleeson', 'John'] 
    """ 
[/student_code]
